description: Built web forms and dealer locator for Zero website. Connected web, Meta & Google forms to HubSpot through Zapier. Created script in HubSpot to accurately route global lead submissions to closest dealer. Increased lead submissions by 34% and routing accuracy by 8%.

Collaborated with development agency to re-design and re-build the Zero Motorcycles website from scratch. Created timeline with deadlines and deliverables, held semiweekly dev stand-ups, and delegated work. With 14 unique locales, an accessories website on Shopify, model pages, lead capturing forms, and events and dealer map page, and 300+ more pages - deployed project within 5 months of start.
